docs.title: Welcome to PIPE Team MaerskStreamlining Global Logistics Through DevOps Excellence
docs.text: Our comprehensive documentation portal provides everything you need to build, deploy, and maintain our global logistics infrastructure.

docs.title: Quick Access
docs.text:
🚀 Getting Started

Onboarding guide for new DevOps team members and setup instructions.

Start Here → 🔧 CI/CD Pipeline

Automated deployment workflows, Jenkins configurations, and Git strategies.

View Pipeline → ☁️ Infrastructure

Terraform modules, Kubernetes clusters, and cloud architecture diagrams.

Explore Infrastructure → 📊 Monitoring

Grafana dashboards, Prometheus alerts, and performance metrics.

Check Monitoring → 🛡️ Best Practices

Security guidelines, compliance standards, and operational procedures.

Learn Best Practices → ❓ Support

Incident response, on-call rotation, and escalation procedures.

Get Support →

docs.title: Getting Started with Maersk PIPE
docs.text: Welcome to the Maersk DevOps team! This guide will help you set up your development environment and understand our workflow.

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• Access: GitHub access, AWS credentials, and VPN configuration
  • Tools: Docker, Terraform, kubectl, and our internal CLI tool
  • Knowledge: Basic understanding of containerization and cloud infrastructure

docs.title: Quick Setup
docs.text:
# Clone the infrastructure repository
git clone git@github.com:Maersk/infrastructure.git

# Run setup script
cd infrastructure
./scripts/setup-dev-env.sh

# Verify installation
Maersk-cli doctor

docs.title: Development Workflow
docs.text:
1. Branch Strategy: Feature branches from develop
  2. Code Review: Required for all changes
  3. Testing: Automated tests must pass
  4. Deployment: Through CI/CD pipeline only

docs.title: Useful Commands
docs.text:
# Deploy to staging
Maersk-cli deploy staging

# Check cluster status  
kubectl get pods -n Maersk-core

# Access logs
Maersk-cli logs service=tracking-api

docs.title: Support Resources
docs.text:
• Microsoft Teams: DevOps Support channel - General questions
  • PagerDuty: Production incidents and urgent issues
  • Documentation: Continuous improvements and updates

Need help? Contact your onboarding buddy or join our daily stand-up at 9:30 AM EST
